ack.p: The first author would like to gratefully acknowledge Anna University, Chennai, for supporting this research in the form of the Anna Centenary research fellowship fund and would like to convey her heartfelt gratitude to the team members from the Centre for Climate Change and Adaptation Research, who supported us through the successful completion of this research. We also would like to thank all the stakeholders who rendered their valuable support, especially to the officers of the research and training centers of the Department of Agriculture, the Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, the Department of Socio and Agro Forestry, and the Kancheepuram Forest Department, who facilitated this participatory research whole heartedly, and the Central and State Ground Water Board and the farming communities for their active involvement in providing essential input.
